snippet: A native of India who is now a university dean in the United States lists some basic questions prospective applicants to American colleges and universities should be able to answer.
abstract: A native of India who is now a university dean in the United States lists some basic questions prospective applicants to American colleges and universities should be able to answer.

headline.main: Before Applying to U.S. Colleges, Indian Students Should Be Able to Answer 'Why?'
